author: powercode
body:
The first line of the help description is added to
the tooltip, in addition to the syntax.

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6275

## PR Summary

In CompletionCompleters, the help system is used to get the first line of the Help Description.
That is used when displaying tooltips.

![cmdhelp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3505151/36815376-cd520edc-1cda-11e8-9fb9-3f2c261c77bd.gif)

Not really sure how to test this properly. It depends on installed help, and currently the help system seems to be broken for other cultures than en-US.
